com.deflatedpickle.bugmagic.api.spell

Class Spell

  • com.deflatedpickle.bugmagic.api.spell.Spell
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoFertilizerSpell, AutoHarvesterSpell, AutoHoeSpell, AutoPlanterSpell, EssenceCollectorSpell, ItemCollectorSpell

    public class Spell

    A spell that can be cast with something capable of interface SpellCaster

    Officially, this can be cast with the class Wand, however more spell casters can be added, by making them capable of @interface SpellCaster

    See Also:
    interface SpellCaster, class Wand, interface SpellCaster
